name: google-meet
title: Google Meet
description: Start a Google Meet directly from Raycast
author: vitoorgomes

commands.name: default-profile
commands.title: Create Meet
commands.subtitle: Google Meet
commands.description: Creates a new meeting room with your default browser and copy the link to your clipboard.

commands.name: manual-profile
commands.title: Create Meet With Specified Profile
commands.subtitle: Google Meet with specified profile
commands.description: Creates a new meeting room with your default browser and copy the link to your clipboard.
